Desc.entry: A private residential home providing accommodation for 32 residents situated in the Peak National Park. The home includes a purpose built facility offering long term residential Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) care for 15 residents. Run by Heathcotes Care Nursing Homes. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
